Recap: Bo and John both admit they doubt that original Todd murdered Victor Lord and believe it's very possible that Jack is lying even though Jack somehow knew how to "appear" to know what happened. Original Todd gets taken to jail although he protests he did not do it. Right then, Irene goes to see him and he concludes that he knows she has framed him and might very well have killed not only killed Victor but also "arranged" to make both Louie and the gun disappear so that he got framed for the murder. she all but admits she has and that she can help him find the gun to get exonerated if he does what she wants. Brody proposes to Natalie and she tells him no. He concludes it must be because of John. Rick convinces Bas to sign a contract with him so that Bas and Starr can produce music together. Starr and James are adamantly against her working with Rick. But she reluctantly agrees to do it when Rick tells her that their dream will be ruined if they don't work with Rick and tells her she is not serious the way he is. Rex goes to the Kentucky hospital knowing that there is something of significance there regarding Gigi although he does not know specifically what it would be. Kim notices him and attempts to urge the nurse to get rid of him by telling her he's dangerous. But he is able to stay and is very surprised to see her there. He then urges her to tell her what she knows. But she realizes she better not and then she reveals that she is keeping Stacy, Gigi's sister, in the private hospital room and needs to keep a secret that Rex must never know.
Transcript: Todd: I didn't do it, you know. As much as I wanted to, I did not kill my brother.

Todd: I'm innocent. I am. He's lying.

Jack: It was only fair, right? I told you, I would get justice. That's what I did.

Rex: You're a saint.
Kim: Yeah, I am.
Rex: So, how did you pay the hospital bills?
Kim: Hmm?
Rex: Clint said that was an issue.
Kim: It isn't anymore because her family came up and they took care of all of it. Isn't that amazing?
Rex: It's incredible.
Kim: Yeah.
Rex: So, if Annie was discharged this morning, what are you still doing here?
Kim: She left some stuff here, so I told her I'd pick it up for her. I better go grab it before they throw it out.
Rex: Right.
Kim: I'm sorry, Rex. I hope you find what you're looking for.
Rex: I won't give up. That much I know.
Kim: Oh, God. Rex is gone. Thank God. That was a close one, Stacy. There's no way I could let him see your face. We both know why.
[SCENE_BREAK]

Shane: I want justice for what happened to you, Mom. I want the people who were actually responsible to pay! Jack thinks he got justice for his dad by telling the cops that Todd Manning killed him. There's one problem. Jack's lying.
Starr: Jack, where were you? You missed the whole gathering for Victor.
Jack: I was with Dad.
Starr: At the cemetery?
Jack: Yeah. Where's the food? I'm starving.
Starr: We already put it away. Come on. I'll get you some food on the way home.
Jack: No. We should hang out here. We should celebrate.
Starr: Celebrate what?
Jack: Thanks to me, Scarface is behind bars.
[SCENE_BREAK]

Todd: What kind of a person are you? You're blackmailing me to get me to give you this thing that I don't have. And if I don't give it to you -- because I don't have it -- you're gonna sit back and watch me go to jail for the rest of my life for a murder that I didn't commit?
Irene: Yes.
Todd: Yes? That's it? Just yes?
Irene: Let me elaborate. If you share your crazy theory with anyone, if you tell anyone that I know where the gun is, I can assure you, it will never be found.
Cop: Lieutenant McBain has some questions for you.
Irene: Oh, how lovely. Think about what I said, Todd. I am the only one who can help you. After all, a boy's best friend is his mother.
